title: (45400) Mora - 24 Camino Santa Lucía
description: Parking of the municipal soccer field. No services. During the day somewhat crowded, but at night it is quiet to sleep. Next to the swimming pool and municipal park.

title: (45400) Mora - 37 Calle Manzaneque
description: Laundry. Hours from 8 a.m. to 11 p.m.

title: (45400) Mora - 0 Carretera Orgaz-Manzaneque
description: Parking area without services and with some shade. Very close to sports areas, municipal swimming pool, civil guard and a park with grass and shade.

title: (45400) Mora - 2 Carretera Cementerio
description: Mini 3-seater ac area with gray discharge grid in each square. To the left there is a sewage box (marked WC) and behind it in wall cupboard is the fresh water. Its a bit difficult to locate everything but it works for servicing, if you don't need electricity, it does its job.

title: (45400) -
description: Hermitage of the Virgen de la Antigua. Parking to enjoy magnificent views of the town, mountains of Toledo and several castles. Overnight is not recommended, as it is uneven. Start of mountain biking and hiking routes along a path that surrounds the mountain range in front. On the way there is a house with a well, from which clean water can be recharged.

title: (45430) Mascaraque - CM42
description: Service station with free drinking water.

title: (45450) Orgaz - 2 Camino los Yébenes
description: Large flat parking, no services

title: (45420) Almonacid de Toledo - 1 Calle Santa Bárbara
title_short: (45420) Almonacid de Toledo - 1 Calle Santa Bárbara
description: Fantastic place at the castle ruins "Castillo Almonacid de Toledo" with a magnificent all-round view and a fantastic sunset. Space for two or three vehicles. Unsuitable for larger vehicles, as the drive in the village leads through very narrow streets.

title: (45789) Caserío Venta Vieja -
description:
Not so difficult to access through sand roads. ok for bigger vans.

the spot is very calm, 100% nature. it's beautiful as well. But! 

it's a little dirty... we gathered 4 big trash bags in a 50m radius and were happy to clean the nature a little.

come with your kids and teach them to clean natural spots!

nasty bits appart, it's beautiful and calm and in the middle of nowhere, I'll come again to clean a different spot:)

title: (45789) Turleque -
description: Alone in the world by the lake, feet in the water. at the entrance of the lake a garbage can, remember to bring your waste there. very nice spot with duck and fish in the lake.

title: (45789) Turleque - CM-4133
description: Roadside bar with space to stop and some shadows, little stop along the way

title: (45789) Turleque -
description: Near the dam and its huge lake, several car parks used during the day by local fishermen. Breathtaking view.

title: (45780) Tembleque - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place where you can spend the night. It is an esplanade located at the entrance to the reservoir, so it is a good place for large vehicles. From 7 am and during the day you can hear cars coming into the swamp to fish or spend the day, but it's still very quiet. Less than 5 min walk towards the road there is a garbage can.

title: (45470) Los Yébenes - 297 Plaza Rústica-4
description: Los Yebenes Municipal Park. The area is newly created, very clean. It has panoramic views of the town and the area is very quiet. Good shade.

title: (45110) Ajofrín - Cam. de las Merinas
description: Good access by road from Ajofrin following the Camino de Santiago to the Cuatro Caminos hermitage. (There are signs) .. Lots of shade and picnic areas. 100 m before there is a fountain

title: (11408) Tembleque - 98 A-4
description: It's just a gross little respol rest stop but they have a water faucet to fill up from and parking. It's super trashy but eh. Free water and a bathroom.

title: (45780) Tembleque - 100 Autovía del Sur
description: Service station with gas station, parking and fountain to recharge clean water

title: (45006) Nambroca - 76 Calle de las Vaguadas
description:
Quiet parking at the entrance of urbanization the snows
Some Saturdays weddings are held in the restaurant and parking is full. Otherwise it is empty.
Food stores
pharmacy restaurants
Asphalted and flat
Illuminated at night.

title: (45780) Tembleque - 33 Calle Vega
description: Wide space, paved, 2 minutes walk from the Plaza Mayor. It is a street, without buildings, in the town. Much easier than the others.

title: (45780) Tembleque - 61 Carretera Madrid
description: Municipal sports facilities parking, Avda. De Madrid. It would fit 10 ACs. Some flat and others with a slight incline. Shades and picnic area. Illuminated street and very close to the center. We stopped to eat, I don't know if it will be possible to spend the night. At noon very quiet

title: (45780) Tembleque - 6 Calle las Cruces

title: (45780) Tembleque - 3 Calle las Cruces
description: Beautiful land near the historic center.

title: (45780) Tembleque - 6A Carretera Andalucía
description: Public parking of the Tembleque Sports Complex. A bit far from the center of town but a very quiet and safe place to spend the night. We came here because in the other place in the marked town they threw stones at the motorhome. I recommend this place to stay overnight.

title: (45750) Huerta de Valdecarábanos - 139 Extrarradio
description: Free municipal parking. Located in a very quiet area, next to a beautiful hermitage and playground.

title: (45007) Toledo - 36 Calle Río Guadarrama
description: Washers and dryers suitable for all types and sizes of clothing and with washer and dryer exclusively for pet clothing. You don't need to carry detergents. Wash and dry in about an hour. Spacious and comfortable premises, with free wifi. Easy parking.

title: (45750) Huerta de Valdecarábanos - 8 Plaza Mazón
description: Small free parking. Peaceful place.

title: (45123) Layos - 30 Calle Calvo Sotelo
description: Parking next to a school, level and quiet land to spend the night, without services.

title: (45700) Consuegra - 29A Carretera Yébenes
description: Few parking spaces, but with plenty of shadows and a few tables. be careful to avoid the night because there is a great risk of rodents.

title: (45700) Consuegra - 7A Calle 1
description:
self-service laundry
Coffee
Meal

title: (45006) Toledo - 1 Avenida de Santa Bárbara
description: Parking at the entrance to Toledo, next to the fire station and the soccer field. Quiet and safe place.

title: (45004) Toledo - C. Azuela

title: (45760) La Guardia - Carretera de Andalucía

Ample space with folding tables for your clothes. Ample and free parking without a blue zone.

description:
Very good parking and central.

description:

a little sloping but if you go to the parking lot and go up two side ones you are almost straight.

title: (45004) Toledo - 13 Carretera Circunvalación
description: Fountain with drinking water and start of a route to see the stone of the Moorish king

title: (45122) Argés - C. Hernán Páez
description: Street of an urbanization, a lot of free space along the entire street. pretty flat Ideal for spending the night and going to the Puy du Fou park.

title: (45123) Layos - Calle Calvo Sotelo
description: Very quiet place on the shore of the Guajaraz reservoir. You can put parking closer to the water by the roads but there is a small asphalt roundabout at the end of the road. Total tranquility

description: Paid parking at Toledo station, an excellent alternative when the free car parks are full.

title: (45004) Toledo - 36 Carretera Circunvalación
description: Picnic area overlooking all of Toledo next to the valley viewpoint. no wc or water

title: (45006) Toledo - Ronda de Juanelo
description: Small parking although this may be suitable for some campers. Ideal for vans. Excellent view of the city and near the bridge that gives access to escalators. No toilets or showers but there is a footbridge that leads to another car park. Very calm and quiet

title: (45700) Consuegra - 6 Avenida Castilla la Mancha
description: Parking in the center of town.

title: () La Guardia - 1A Calle Cercas del Cura
title_short: () La Guardia - 1A Calle Cercas del Cura

title: (45001) Toledo - 6 Cuesta de los Capuchinos
description: A great spot to park your van during the day directly in the centre. 1st floor up to 2.3m. 2nd floor solely 1.75m. A very helpful guy guided us the way into the parking spot. Perfect and safe place to park your car for a short visit in Toledo.

title: (45700) Consuegra - 19 Calle Vertedera Alta
description: Sandy parking, near the center, ideal for visiting the city.

title: (45001) Toledo - 5 Calle Miguel de Cervantes
description: Laundry center Toledo. Self-service laundry, has washing machines with a capacity of 13 and 17 kilos (36 minutes) and dryers with a capacity of 19 kilos 20 minutes. Wash and dry, in cash, bills and coins, , with the possibility of paying with your mobile phone by downloading the application available in the Play Store. It has an automatic store open 24 hours

title: (45006) Toledo - 1A Paseo de la Rosa
description:
Free parking very close to the center. Without services. Hovwever used by commuters and fills up very fast on weekdays. Arrive well outside work hours to secure a spot.
Camping forbidden road sign

title: (45700) Consuegra - 90 Calle Urda
description: Parking nearby the pool. In front of the mills and the castle. No problem for the night. Asphalted site with an unlimited and flat height.Next to the tennis and paddle tennis (paying and by reservation) and a free field with goal posts and basketball board. No service.

title: (45122) Argés -
description: Place accessible by a dirt / sand road (going gently the road is not very complicated for a van). On the edge of a lake has some water, the view is magnificent, not to mention the sunset, the day some fisherman, and at night we were alone on the spot in peace.

title: (45003) Toledo - 3 Avenida Castilla la Mancha
description: Parking with 339 seats, very spacious. Many autocarabanas. There is no source. In the morning you can go to the bathroom of the bus station :) You can take the dogs to the river walk. Running, or going by bike (many mosquitoes)

name: Camper Parking Consuegra
title: (45700) Camper Parking Consuegra
description:
Gravel car park at the foot of the castle and the mills, with picnic tables, ideal for an overnight stay
Very quiet and superb view of the castle lit up at night.
The town itself is a 10 minute walk away.
The walk to the top is difficult and you should take your time.
The road that goes up to the mills / castles is prohibited for equipped vehicles!

title: (45003) Toledo - 2822 Avenida Castilla la Mancha
description: Parking safon we stayed 2 nights and without problem, we asked in the tourist office

title: (45122) Argés - Unnamed Road
description: Unpaved parking next to dam of the Embalse de Guajaraz. Quiet. Nice views of lake. No services. Great for dogs. Good hikes.

title: (45003) Toledo - 1A Camino Safont
description:
A small vacant lot where you can park your camper, also larger ones such as 8m long.

A great alternative for when the other nearby official parking spaces are full. 

From here you can walk to the center in 20-30 minutes.

title: (45003) Toledo - 9 Avenida Castilla la Mancha
description: Public parking lot at the indoor pool. Very central, in 15 minutes in the city center. Still quite calm.

title: (45003) Toledo - Av. Castilla la Mancha, 34
description: Simple parking lot, centrally located without any supply and disposal, with many cars, to visit the city, optimal, no separately marked mobile home parking spaces, very clean.

title: (45003) Toledo - 2 Carretera Mocejón
description: Stadium car park. It's rough ground but possible to crash for night or two. 5min to toledo town. Best thing it's free :)

title: (45003) Toledo - 9 Avenida Castilla la Mancha
description: Parking is free, without spring water or emptying but calm.

title: (45003) Toledo - 3A Paseo Merchán
description: Just a few parking spots in line but since it is a paid parking lot you may get a place. It is very cheap! And is tight by the entrance of Toledo.

title: (45003) Toledo - CM-401

title: (45004) Toledo - 1 Av. de la Reconquista

title: (45004) Toledo - 11 Cuesta de San Jerónimo
description: Super quiet place with a magnificent view of the city of Toledo, free parking day and night next to a sports field and a church. You can walk to the historic center in about 15 min.

title: (45002) Toledo - 13 Paseo Recaredo
description: Part of the car park is under the bridge. The rest outside. Very close to the river.

title: (45004) Toledo - 6-8 Paseo Circo Romano

title: () La Guardia - 117 Urbanización Santo Niño

OK for us with PL of 9T5. 1st monuments about 15 min walk. No drainage, no water, no electricity. Quiet on weekdays anyway. There are other CCs with us.

title: () Toledo - Unnamed Road

There are no services.

title: (45004) Toledo - 10 Calle de Mejico
description: Laundry 500 m from the car park... easy instructions....11kg,16kg 4 and 5.5 euro drying 2 EUR for 18mn

title: (45760) La Guardia - 79 Autovía del Sur

title: (45760) La Guardia -

title: (45160) Guadamur - 8V Calle Concilios

A nice place with tables, shades, a stream with ducks, peacocks, swings, fronton, sand field and plenty of shade to eat and spend the day with the little ones. Inconvenience, the puppies have to be on a leash, although the park is large and there are areas where they do not bother loose.

title: (45005) Toledo - 15 Avenida del Madroño

title: (45160) Guadamur - 3 Camino Fábrica
description: Parking open for the day in a park

title: (45590) Magán - 13 Calle Calvo Sotelo
description: Free parking. With drinking water fountain. Ideal to spend a few nights there. Trade not very far possible to go there on foot. Really very quiet place. There is a swimming pool at 1 euro 50

title: (45311) Dosbarrios - 3 Camino Barranco
description: Flat and quiet. Very close to a bar/restaurant.

The guard came in the morning but only to greet us kindly (no more, normal control since there are hunting preserve farms). It is at the entrance of a farm but there is a lot of space and almost nobody passed

title: (45700) Consuegra - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area under the pines and between the fields of olive trees. Absolutely not frequented because not indicated, we spent the night there. Only downside, the road although a hundred meters away, is busy. Perfect place surrounded by nature

title: (45162) Noez -
description: Sierra de Noez. Right next to the town of Noez. Quiet place at night and with great views of all the surrounding towns. I had a quiet night without incident. Hardly accessible area, only small and strong campers, motorhomes I do not think they can easily reach the top of the Sierra.

title: (45291) Cobeja - Cam. Molinos
description: Parking next to a football stadium, very quiet.

title: (45300) Ocaña - N-4 Camino de San Gregorio

title: (45300) Ocaña -

title_short: (45870) Lillo - Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas

Recreational area with picnic tables, a very beautiful hermitage, animals in captivity (raptors, ...) and archaeological remains of an old town. Very easy access by a dirt track, on the outskirts of town.

address.street: Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas

title: (45860) Villacañas - 78 Poligono 11
description: Leisure area with tables and benches (two of which are rented). Quiet (with a road nearby but very little traffic). No limited parking but with designated places.

title: (45127) Las Ventas Con Peña Aguilera - 51 Calle Don Casto Martín
title_short: (45127) Las Ventas Con Peña Aguilera - 51 Calle Don Casto Martín

Hermitage and mill completely restored. Nice views from the mill.

title: (45720) Camuñas - 15 Calle las Viñas

title: (45529) Route 42 Camper Park
description:
Temporarily closed due to flooding caused by storm DANA.

Private area with all services. Very close to the highway, 20' from Toledo and 40' from Madrid. Very quiet, ideal to spend a few days.
